domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Cases are rising and the president says if we stop testing people, then the virus will stop spreading. Either the president is an idiot who doesn’t understand that’s now how it works or he thinks his supporters are idiots who will believe that. #COVID19
